FuncDef:
The ds-lite time local command enables a device to display the local time in flexible DS-Lite syslogs.
The undo ds-lite time local command disables a device from displaying the local time in flexible DS-Lite syslogs.
By default, a device displays the UTC time in flexible DS-Lite syslogs.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a device to display the local time in flexible DS-Lite syslogs, run the ds-lite time local command.
Precautions
The ds-lite user-session create-rate command takes effect only on VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
